task: When and where the most recent World Cup was held, and which team was the winner?

user_action_and_explanation: type "most recent World Cup location and winner" into the search bar to find the latest information about when and where the World Cup was held, and which team won.
observation: The search results provide information about the most recent World Cup. From the Wikipedia snippet, it can be deduced that Argentina are the current champions, winning their third title in the 2022 World Cup held in Qatar. The search has effectively delivered the required details about the winner and location of the most recent World Cup.
